definition: abbr. for Sichuan Province 四川[Si4 chuan1] in southwest China

sentences.english: In this paper troche medicine of ligustrazine phosphate has been quantitative analysis.
sentences.chinese: 并用此方法对药品磷酸川芎嗪片剂进行了分析。

sentences.english: Patients in treatment group were injected Ligustrazine to Shenshu point, 0.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨肾俞穴注射川芎嗪对高血压病降压作用。

sentences.english: LGT reversed the results of mentioned indices as above markedly.
sentences.chinese: 川芎嗪可逆转上述指标的异常变化。

sentences.english: Objective It is to evaluate the effect of ligustrazine on severe commotio retinae.
sentences.chinese: 目的评价川芎嗪对重度视网膜震荡的疗效。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To investigate the characteristics of nasal mucosa absorption of ligustrazine phosphate and its pharmacokinetics.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究磷酸川芎嗪的鼻黏膜吸收特性及体内药动学。

definition: Achyranthes bidentata (root used in Chinese medicine)
root of herbaceous peony (Paeonia lactiflora), used in TCM
the rhizome of large-headed atractylodes (Atractylodes macrocephaia)
root bark of the peony tree (used in TCM)
Chinese thorowax (Bupleurum chinense)/root of Chinese thorowax (used in TCM)
dried fruit of immature citron or trifoliate orange (used in TCM)
common water plantain (Alisma plantago-aquatica)/water plantain rhizome (used in TCM)
huangqi/milk vetch root (used in TCM)/Astragalus membranaceus or Astragalus mongholicus
